attributes.action: Help Finance The New DNA Crohns Vaccine @ St George's Hospital, London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Chronic Crohns Campaign UK has been going now for 11 years, and in that time we have helped raise Awareness and £1.8 million, here in the UK  & from around the World, ALL in private funds for this New DNA Crohns Vaccine with Prof.John Hermon - Taylor @ St George's Hospital, London. We desperately need more finance to test, licence and produce this brand New DNA Crohns Vaccine, and  financial help from Government to complete this mission to get rid of Crohns Disease from over 300.000 suffering this horrendous IBD illness here in the UK, Millions around the World.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Help Finance The New DNA Crohns Vaccine @ St George's Hospital, London."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17538


Prime Minister's Office
